channel.title: Client BG/Login box
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just made these and want some opinions on them. I'm planning to sell these on a different site (I can't tell which one because that would be against the rules) and I want to know if you guys think they are good enough to sell and how much you think they are worth. This is not an advertisement, I just want some opinions on if they are worth selling and for how much!
[img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/30hszeo.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/vglhjb.jpg[/img]
*NOTE the H in a circle is my server LOGO so that would be customized based on the servers logo.

item.title: Client BG/Login box
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

The title doesn’t feel medieval enough, make sure you keep to your theme. The background itself looks quite bad but the login box makes it look a bit better.

Read full topic

to be honest the background is not nice at all you can still keep the regular BG but have a main focus point… try reading up on it

item.title: Client BG/Login box
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

kronikz:

login box is really nice, but the client background, eh. Why so much blur? Takes away the meaning of using a concept art as a background.

With the login box on top of the background, it takes away the center piece of the BG so I used unfaded text to draw the attention elsewhere. Take a look.

OT: What would you price this at?

Read full topic
